channel.title: Linux on Slices of a hacker's mind
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Slices of a hacker's mind

item.title: KVM and I/O problems
item.description:
KVM and Postgresql Problem: Slow I/O - with Software Raid 1 and LVM2.
So we had some trouble with a Software Raid 1 and our KVM Virtual Machines, the writing and reading speed was just bad. But this was only for paralle wirte/read requests. So doing single test like dd or even bonnie didn't show the problem.

item.title: MySQL to Postgresql
item.description: I dislike MySQL. I never did like it, since Oracle bought Sun it starting to become more then just disliking it. I prefer to work with Postgresql. I want to migrate some of my MySQL DB to Postgresql.

item.title: Howto fix libgeos_c.so not found
item.description: I'm working with Python Django and PostGIS. When i try to add the Geo support to the Project, i hit this error message: OSError: /usr/local/lib/libgeos_c.

item.title: How to empty swap
item.description: Bad applications does Bad stuff with you Memor. Today my Skype decide to flood my Memory.

item.title: Debian PostgreSQL 8.4 can't create Database with UTF-8 Encoding
item.description: The Problem I encounter a problem with fresh Debian VM. I create this VM for our developer, during the installation script following problem appears and stop the script: new encoding (UTF8) is incompatible with the encoding of the template database (SQL_ASCII) HINT: Use the same encoding as in the template database, or use template0 as template.
